cast.name: 拉塞尔·博尔特 Russell Boulter

introduction: Borneo has spent its entire existence circling the equator. Consistent sunlight and rainfall means the perfect conditions for life. But it is the battle for those resources that makes Borneo one the richest regions on the planet. It fuels a bizarre realm of giant apes, tiny bears, plants that kill and jellyfish that farm. We will see diverse creatures and behaviour never documented before. Borneo has secrets to reveal.
